thread.title: One local eatery among nation's most romantic restaurants, OpenTable says
thread.title_full: One local eatery among nation's most romantic restaurants, OpenTable says

author: Sonya Sorich
title: One local eatery among nation's most romantic restaurants, OpenTable says
text: Boulevard Bistro in Elk Grove is among the nation's most romantic restaurants, according… more istock As Valentine's Day approaches, one Sacramento area restaurant just got a big date-night boost. Boulevard Bistro at 8941 Elk Grove Blvd. is the sole local entry in OpenTable's 2017 list of the nation's most romantic restaurants, which was released Wednesday. The Elk Grove eatery, owned by Bret Bohlmann , serves New American cuisine. On Facebook , it's billed as a "quaint 30-chair fine dining restaurant." Boulevard Bistro in Elk Grove is among the nation's most romantic restaurants, according… more istock To create the list, the online reservation service evaluated reviews submitted by verified OpenTable diners for more than 24,000 restaurants nationwide. The list is based on reviews submitted between Dec. 1, 2015 and Nov. 30, 2016 . No local eateries made the list in 2016 . Of the 100 restaurants on this year's list, seven are in California. The full list is available online . Sonya Sorich is digital editor at the Sacramento Business Journal. She also oversees social media activity and writes about retailing, small business and restaurants. Industries
